id.description: The database id of the public key

userId.description: The user id the key belongs to

id.description: The database id of the user

scope.description: the list of scopes the user has

lastAuthAt.description: The time of the last authentication

createdAt.description: The date the user was created

updatedAt.description: The date the user was last updated

keys.description: The public keys of the user

sub.description:
The unique user sub
if undefined the sub from the auth token will be used

key.description: The public key of the user as a JWK

isRootKey.description: If true the key is a root key, used to decrypt all datasets

sub.description: The user the key should belong to

data.description: The public key as a JWK

isRootKey.description: If true the key is a root key, used to decrypt all datasets

sub.description: The user the key belongs to
The user the key belongs to

Mnemonic.description:
mnemonics are human readable unique identifiers for datasets
mnemonics have the form <random adjective>_<random first name>

id.description: The database id of the file data

size.description: The size of the file in bytes

id.description: The database id of the inode

dataId.description: The database id file data if the inode is a file

fileName.description: The name of the file to upload

directory.description: The mnemonic of the directory to upload the file to

filePath.description: The original path of the file

size.description: The size of the file in bytes

tag.description: A custom searchable tag for the file

id.description: The database id of the chunk

dataId.description: The id of the data the chunk belongs to

hash.description: The SHA-256 hash of the unencrypted chunk data base64url encoded

iv.description: The AES-256 initialization vector base64url encoded

start.description: The start of the chunk as a byte position in the file

end.description: The end of the chunk as a byte position in the file

crc.description: The CRC32 checksum of the encrypted chunk data base64url encoded

expired.description:
false if the token has not expired,
otherwise a string describing how long ago the token expired

scopes.description: The array of scopes the token has
The array of scopes the token should have

lifetime.description:
The time in seconds the token should be valid for
If null the token will never expire

id.description: The database id of the key

inodeId.description: The inode id the key belongs to

id.description: The database id of the member

inodeId.description: The database id of the inode

AESKey.description:
The AES-256 encryption key used to encrypt and decrypt datasets.
base64url encoded

subs.description: The users to add to the dataset

keys.description: The list of AES-256 keys required to decrypt all child datasets

sub.description: The user to set the permission for

mnemonic.description: The mnemonic of the inode to move

parent.description: Optional: The mnemonic of the new parent directory

keys.description: The list of AES-256 keys required to decrypt all child datasets

name.description: Optional: The new name of the inode

tag.description: Optional: The new tag of the inode

children.description: The list of inodes in the directory

parent.description: The mnemonic of the parent directory

tag.description: A custom searchable tag for the directory

inodes.description: The list of inodes that match the search query

User.description: User is the type that represents a user in the system.

sub.description: The subject of the user, a unique identifier

isAdmin.description: Does the user have the dabih:admin scope

get.description: Get all the file information required to download a single file
Recursively list all files in a directory

parameters.description:
The range of bytes in the chunk
It should be in the format `bytes {start}-{end}/{size?}`
parameters.name: content-range

parameters.description:
The SHA-256 hash of the chunk data encoded in base64url
It should be in the format `sha-256={hash}`
parameters.name: digest
